name: Tribrigade Lugal the Silver Bullet
text:
2+ Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Winged Beast monsters
 During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster from your hand or GY, but negate its effects, also return it to the hand during the End Phase. If this card is sent to the GY: You can make all monsters your opponent currently controls lose 300 ATK for each monster you control with a different Type, until the end of the turn. You can only use each effect of "Tribrigade Lugal the Silver Bullet" once per turn.
